message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $20,000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm sorry, but I can't agree to $17,500. I'm willing to go up to $15,000.
